name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read Me Later - Save Tabs to Read List

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly save all of your tabs for later reading with just one click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep Your Tabs Organized + Store Tabs for Later üìö

üòµ Problem: Are you overwhelmed by a growing list of to-read tabs that clutter your browser and make it hard to stay focused?

ü§© Solution: Meet Read Me Later! ‚Äî the ultimate Chrome extension for tab management designed to keep your browser neat and optimized. Easily save browser tabs for later without the chaos, ensuring an efficient and clean workspace.

üöÄ Features:
‚≠ê Effortless Tab Management: Store one or all of your open tabs with a single click, and optionally close them to optimize browser performance and reduce load.

‚≠ê Smart Input Bar: Quickly save any site with our intelligent input bar, featuring basic auto-completion for faster access.

‚≠ê Quick Searches on the Fly: Need to Google something but short on time? Type your query directly into the extension and press enter to save it for later.

üë®‚Äçüíª For Developers:
‚≠ê Open Source: Contribute to or fork the project on GitHub: https://github.com/yvantot/read-me-later-chromium-extension

‚ùî Why Choose Read Me Later? Maximize productivity with the ultimate tab management tool that keeps your browser clutter-free. Read Me Later helps you maintain a fast, responsive browser by offloading tabs without losing track of important content. Perfect for those who need a reliable browser productivity extension to stay organized and focused.

‚ùî Optimize Your Browser Experience: Designed to save and close tabs seamlessly, this Chrome read later extension ensures you never lose a valuable link while keeping your workspace clean and efficient.

‚ùî Perfect for Busy Professionals: If you're juggling multiple tasks and need to manage your time efficiently, this extension is your go-to tool. Stay organized, reduce distractions, and always have your important links just a click away.
